channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When Financial Industry Regulators Are Judge, Prosecutor, and Beneficiary
item.description: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority banned me from the financial industry for life and imposed a $243,000 fine.

item.title: Kimmel Reinstatement In Five Days Shows Media Can’t Ever Tell The Truth About Trump
item.description: Last week, the propaganda press assured us that self-described comedian Jimmy Kimmel was pulled off air because President Donald Trump was an authorit...

item.title: Trump signs executive order designating Antifa as 'domestic terrorist organization'
item.description: President Trump has signed his promised executive order designating Antifa as a "domestic terrorist organization."

item.title: 11 migrants deported by U.S. to Ghana were sent home despite safety concerns, their lawyer says
item.description: Eleven West African nationals deported by the U.S. to Ghana were sent to their home countries over the weekend despite safety concerns, their lawyer t...

item.title: What the Kirk Memorial Reveals About the Right
item.description: Erika Kirk and Donald Trump channel the American right’s spirit.

item.title: Erika Kirk Reminds Us That Devoted Wives Change The World
item.description: Nurturing the marriage relationship strengthens everything around it, including the family and life missions.

item.title: 'Happy that his voice was silenced': Why more college kids are embracing political violence
item.description: Take a walk across a college campus these days and you're likely to hear some young Americans accepting and justifying, if not fully condoning, politi...

item.title: The Charlie Kirk Memorial Wasn’t Christian Nationalism
item.description: It’s okay to mix politics and religion.

item.title: America’s Leaders Preached The Gospel Without Apology — And It Was Much Needed
item.description: National leaders proclaiming the gospel in a moment of intense tragedy and turmoil is exactly what the nation needs.

item.title: The U.N. Deserves a Trumpian Reckoning
item.description: A fundamental reassessment of the United Nations has been long in coming. Trump may give one when he addresses the body.

item.title: Man charged in D.C. with pointing laser at presidential helicopter
item.description: Federal prosecutors in the District charged a man with pointing a laser at President Trump's helicopter.

item.title: Trump blasts U.N. at General Assembly speech, accuses it of not helping to stop wars
item.description: President Trump arrived at the United Nations on Tuesday and immediately tore into the organization, accusing it of doing nothing to end global confli...

item.title: Palestine Recognitions from Europe and Beyond Ensure Long-Term Irrelevance
item.description: Several countries join a growing list whose recognition of a Palestinian state will ironically shut them out of the future Middle East.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel’s Defenders Are Gaslighting Americans On Free Speech
item.description: Kimmel’s nightly bacchanal of leftist politics puts Disney, ABC and its affiliates in regulatory peril under long-standing broadcast laws.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Memorial Marks Beginning Of The End For Third Wayism, Lukewarm Christianity
item.description: Christians' focus from now on should be on living boldly for the Lord, like Charlie did -- even if it becomes the hill on which we die.
